meta.notes: Clues only. IDs re-numbered to C001..C004; graph/story_index updated accordingly.

C001.name: Weathered Notice
C001.desc_zh: 告示卷翘，雨洗墨晕；其文提及古井旁异光时现，募人证赴市政厅禀报，字里行间，欲盖弥彰。
C001.desc_en: A curling parchment tacked to the town hall board, ink blurred by rain. It mentions strange lights near the old well and requests witnesses to report to the mayor's office.

C002.name: Frayed Mooring Rope
C002.desc_zh: 系船之绳一端色泽深沉如渍；细察纤维，不似风浪磨损，倒像刀痕所断，颇有蹊跷。
C002.desc_en: A length of mooring rope stained a darker color near one end. Up close, the fibers look as though they were cut more than worn through by the sea.

C003.name: Smugglers' Ledger
C003.desc_zh: 皮装薄册，页页皆以暗码记载货物、路线与姓名缩写；数处沾泥如河淤，愈显其来路不正。
C003.desc_en: A slim ledger bound in cracked leather, its pages filled with coded notes about shipments, routes, and initials. A few entries are smudged with what looks like river-mud.

C004.name: Hidden Scrap
C004.desc_zh: 油渍纸条藏于松动木箱之后，其上寥寥数语：『地下室补货／楼上锁码乃我二人结发纪念之日』，暗示机关所在。
C004.desc_en: A grease-stained note tucked behind a loose crate: 'cellar restock / upstairs lock is our wedding anniversary date'.
